text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Project von klugen und verständigen Hauß-Pater, wie auch adelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>
    <VOLUME>2 Folianten</VOLUME>
    <PRICE>6 fl.</PRICE>
    <NOTE>welches durch Subscriptionen gedrucket wird</NOTE>
  </BIBL>.
  Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit Figuren</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>;
  Item, 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Französischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Englischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"(1) Balanced all unclosed or mis-nested tags, especially around the first <BIBL> block. (2) Removed the stray </TITLE> that broke element order. (3) Added missing <BIBL> wrapper for the Fleury item. (4) Closed the final <BIBL> that was left open. (5) Replaced misspelled <PRIZE> with <PRICE>. (6) Added <NOTE> elements to preserve running text that was otherwise outside any tag. (7) Added <PRICE>, <NOTE> and <VOLUME> tags to structure bibliographic data. (8) Normalised fractured word “Sub. scriptionen” to “Subscriptionen”. (9) Deleted stray control/printing characters (e.g. “‡”). (10) Fixed obvious mojibake (√ø → ü, √§ → ä, √¢ → ö, etc.). (11) Corrected typographical errors (avelichem ➔ adelichem, Hau-Patter ➔ Hauß-Pater, neu). (12) Indented and line-broken the XML for readability while keeping it well-formed."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM>
  In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Project von klugen und verständigen Hauß-Pater, wie auch adelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>
    <VOLUME>2 Folianten</VOLUME>
    <PRICE>6 fl.</PRICE>
    <NOTE>welches durch Subscriptionen gedrucket wird</NOTE>
  </BIBL>.
  Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit Figuren</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>;
  Item, 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Französischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Englischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: (1) Balanced all unclosed or mis-nested tags, especially around the first <BIBL> block. (2) Removed the stray </TITLE> that broke element order. (3) Added missing <BIBL> wrapper for the Fleury item. (4) Closed the final <BIBL> that was left open. (5) Replaced misspelled <PRIZE> with <PRICE>. (6) Added <NOTE> elements to preserve running text that was otherwise outside any tag. (7) Added <PRICE>, <NOTE> and <VOLUME> tags to structure bibliographic data. (8) Normalised fractured word “Sub. scriptionen” to “Subscriptionen”. (9) Deleted stray control/printing characters (e.g. “‡”). (10) Fixed obvious mojibake (√ø → ü, √§ → ä, √¢ → ö, etc.). (11) Corrected typographical errors (avelichem ➔ adelichem, Hau-Patter ➔ Hauß-Pater, neu). (12) Indented and line-broken the XML for readability while keeping it well-formed.
